about_the_game:
Inspired by Space Station 13. Experience the chaos in VR or desktop mode!

Live a life on a Space Station, grow plants, mutate them into new types of plants, mix different chemical reagents, and when you are ready, get out and explore outer space to acquire wealth by mining minerals on asteroids. Make sure to defend NanoTrasen:tm: station against Syndicate armed threat... or just don't, it's up to you.

Features:

  • Botany - Harvest and evolve your plants into powerful and newer species. Turn tomato into irradiated bluespace tomato, yum. Side effects may include teleportation into space or station walls.

  • Chemistry - Make different chemical reagents for your own use. Make fertilizers for plants, or things that explode because that is funny.

  • Mining - Collect minerals, a lot of minerals preferably... Dump all your minerals at cargo, build up your fortune in this final frontier.

  • Multiplayer - Full voice chat cross platform (PC and VR) multiplayer. It is not easy being cramped in this metal death can together, but what is life without a little chaos?

    And more to come.
detailed_description:
DISCORD


About the Game

Inspired by Space Station 13. Experience the chaos in VR or desktop mode!

Live a life on a Space Station, grow plants, mutate them into new types of plants, mix different chemical reagents, and when you are ready, get out and explore outer space to acquire wealth by mining minerals on asteroids. Make sure to defend NanoTrasen:tm: station against Syndicate armed threat... or just don't, it's up to you.

Features:

  • Botany - Harvest and evolve your plants into powerful and newer species. Turn tomato into irradiated bluespace tomato, yum. Side effects may include teleportation into space or station walls.

  • Chemistry - Make different chemical reagents for your own use. Make fertilizers for plants, or things that explode because that is funny.

  • Mining - Collect minerals, a lot of minerals preferably... Dump all your minerals at cargo, build up your fortune in this final frontier.

  • Multiplayer - Full voice chat cross platform (PC and VR) multiplayer. It is not easy being cramped in this metal death can together, but what is life without a little chaos?

    And more to come.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual-Core processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mavericks
  • Processor: Dual-Core processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: SpessVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Inspired by Space Station 13! Live a robust life on a Space Station, grow plants, mutate them into new types of plants, mix different chemical reagents, and when you are ready, get out and explore outer space to acquire wealth by mining minerals on asteroids.
